Replying to 
@AaronvanW
 @DeRose
 and 2 others
More generally, the argument put forth is akin to saying that different dialects are different languages.

Different dialects _can_ evolve into different languages (Bcash), but as long as everyone understands each other (Core/Libbitcoin/etc.) it is the same language (Bitcoin).
